user_stories.title: User Registration
user_stories.user_story: As a new user, I want to register an account so that I can access personalized features.
acceptance_criteria: User can access the registration page from the homepage.
User must provide a valid email address, password, and name.
User receives a confirmation email after successful registration.
System prevents duplicate email registrations.
User is redirected to the login page after registration.

user_stories.title: User Login
user_stories.user_story: As a registered user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access my dashboard.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter email and password to log in.
System validates credentials and provides error messages for invalid login.
User is redirected to their dashboard upon successful login.
System supports 'Remember Me' functionality.
User can reset their password if forgotten.

user_stories.title: Password Reset
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget it.
acceptance_criteria: User can request a password reset from the login page.
User receives a password reset email with a secure link.
User can set a new password using the link.
System validates the password reset token for security.
User is notified of successful password reset.

user_stories.title: Profile Management
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to update my profile information so that my account details remain current.
acceptance_criteria: User can access and edit their profile from the dashboard.
User can update name, email, and profile picture.
System validates email format and uniqueness.
Changes are saved and reflected immediately.
User receives confirmation of successful profile update.

user_stories.title: View Dashboard
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view a personalized dashboard so that I can see relevant information at a glance.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays user’s name and profile picture.
Dashboard shows recent activity and notifications.
User can access quick links to main features.
Dashboard updates in real-time with new dATF.
User can customize dashboard widgets.

user_stories.title: Create New Project
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to create a new project so that I can organize my work efficiently.
acceptance_criteria: User can access 'Create Project' from the dashboard.
User can enter project name, description, and set privacy settings.
System validates required fields before creation.
Project appears in the user’s project list after creation.
User receives confirmation of successful project creation.

user_stories.title: Edit Project Details
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to edit project details so that I can keep information up to date.
acceptance_criteria: User can access project settings from the project page.
User can update project name, description, and privacy.
System validates changes before saving.
Changes are reflected immediately in the project list.
User receives confirmation of successful update.

user_stories.title: Delete Project
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to delete a project so that I can remove unwanted projects.
acceptance_criteria: User can access delete option from project settings.
System asks for confirmation before deletion.
Project is removed from user’s project list after deletion.
User receives notification of successful deletion.
Deleted projects cannot be accessed or restored.

user_stories.title: Invite Team Members
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to invite team members to a project so that we can collaborate.
acceptance_criteria: User can send invitations via email from the project page.
Invited users receive an email with a join link.
System prevents duplicate invitations.
Invited users appear in the project team list after accepting.
User receives notification when invitations are accepted.

user_stories.title: Assign Roles to Team Members
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to assign roles to team members so that responsibilities are clear.
acceptance_criteria: User can assign roles (e.g., Admin, Editor, Viewer) to team members.
System enforces role-based permissions for project actions.
Role changes are reflected immediately in the team list.
User receives confirmation of successful role assignment.
Only project owners can change roles.

user_stories.title: Create Task in Project
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to create tasks within a project so that work can be organized and tracked.
acceptance_criteria: User can add tasks with title, description, due date, and assignee.
System validates required fields before task creation.
Task appears in the project task list after creation.
User receives confirmation of successful task creation.
Tasks can be assigned to multiple team members.

user_stories.title: Edit Task Details
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to edit task details so that information remains accurate.
acceptance_criteria: User can update task title, description, due date, and assignee.
System validates changes before saving.
Changes are reflected immediately in the task list.
User receives confirmation of successful update.
Only users with appropriate permissions can edit tasks.

user_stories.title: Mark Task as Complete
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to mark tasks as complete so that progress is tracked.
acceptance_criteria: User can mark tasks as complete from the task list.
Completed tasks are visually distinguished from incomplete tasks.
System updates task status in real-time.
User receives confirmation of successful completion.
Completed tasks can be filtered or hidden.

user_stories.title: Comment on Tasks
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to comment on tasks so that we can discuss and clarify work.
acceptance_criteria: User can add comments to any task.
Comments display author and timestamp.
System supports editing and deleting own comments.
Comments are visible to all project members.
User receives notification for new comments.

user_stories.title: Receive Notifications
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to receive notifications for important events so that I stay informed.
acceptance_criteria: User receives notifications for task assignments, comments, and project updates.
Notifications are visible in the dashboard and via email.
User can customize notification preferences.
System marks notifications as read when viewed.
User can clear or archive notifications.

user_stories.title: Search Projects and Tasks
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to search for projects and tasks so that I can quickly find relevant information.
acceptance_criteria: User can enter keywords to search projects and tasks.
Search results display matching projects and tasks.
System supports filtering by status, date, and assignee.
Search results update in real-time as user types.
User can access items directly from search results.

user_stories.title: Export Project DATF
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to export project dATF so that I can share or archive information.
acceptance_criteria: User can export project dATF in CSV or PDF format.
Export includes project details, tasks, and team members.
System generates export files quickly and accurately.
User receives confirmation when export is complete.
Exported files are downloadable from the dashboard.

user_stories.title: View Activity Log
user_stories.user_story: As a user, I want to view an activity log so that I can track changes and actions within projects.
acceptance_criteria: Activity log displays actions by all team members.
Log includes timestamps and descriptions of actions.
User can filter log by date, user, and action type.
Log updates in real-time with new activities.
Only project members can view the activity log.

user_stories.title: Set Task Priority
user_stories.user_story: As a team member, I want to set priority for tasks so that important work is highlighted.
acceptance_criteria: User can assign priority levels (High, Medium, Low) to tasks.
Tasks display priority visually in the task list.
System supports sorting and filtering by priority.
Priority can be changed at any time.
User receives confirmation of priority changes.

user_stories.title: Archive Completed Projects
user_stories.user_story: As a project owner, I want to archive completed projects so that my active workspace remains uncluttered.
acceptance_criteria: User can archive projects from the project settings.
Archived projects are moved to a separate section.
Archived projects are read-only and cannot be edited.
User can restore archived projects if needed.
User receives confirmation of successful archiving.

summary: 20 comprehensive user stories have been generated, covering all major functional requirements including user management, project and task management, collaboration, notifications, search, export, and activity tracking.
